## Introduction

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(knitr)
#options(kableExtra.latex.load_packages = FALSE)
library(kableExtra)
library(psych)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(DescTools)
options(digits=3) # zeigt nur drei Zahlenwerte an

DIL_1 <- read_csv2('data/DIL_1.csv')# header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, sep=";", dec=",", row.names="Dosisname")
df <- data.frame(DIL_1)


DIL_1 <- DIL_1 %>% 
  select(Mittelwert, D_99, D_95, D_1, D_max, D_min)

MAD_DIL_1 <- DIL_1$Mittelwert
MAD_DIL_1 <- MeanAD(DIL_1$Mittelwert, center = 76.23) 

MAD_DIL_1 %>%
  kable(align = c("c"),'html', caption = "Patient 1 - MAD", col.names = c("MAD")) %>%
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = FALSE)

DIL_1<- describe(DIL_1)


DIL_1 <- DIL_1 %>% rename(Numbers = n, Mean = mean, 'Standard deviation' = sd, Median = median, 'Standard errors' = se, Minimum = min, Maximum = max, Range = range)

DIL_1 <- DIL_1 %>% 
  select(Numbers,	Mean,	'Standard deviation',	Median,	Minimum,	Maximum, Range, 'Standard errors')

#kable(DIL_1)
#var_DIL_1 <-  var(DIL_1)
#kable(var_DIL_1)



DIL_1 %>%
  kable(align = c("cccccccc"),'html') %>%
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = FALSE) 

# knitr::kable(align = c("lr"), format ='html', caption = "Patient 1 - DIL constraint", col.names = c("DIL boost constraint", "Numbers")) %>%


#print(DIL_1)

```
